attributes.action: allow the people of the united kingdom to democraticly elect a prime minister of our country and not have one forced upoun us by any political party.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we have had john major and now gordon brown forced upoun us,we are a democracy we have the right to elect who we have as leader of this country

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
